name: Project: Repel (Version A)
description:
Project: Repel is a game that was developed and designed by Artūrs Svars as the game programmer and Rihards Kurts as art designer. It was a bachelors project and was developed in a time span of 3 months.

Project: Repel is a FPS, horror game. In this game, the player has to escape from the mines while fighting against monsters that can only attack the player in dark ares. The player is able to fight these monsters away using the light of a flashlight, as well as shoot them with a gun, although ammo is limited.

Version A of this game is different in that the game has one or multiple enemys in the in stead of one, and unlike in the B version the enemys can be killed with two shots.
